subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4767 is on the way
description_text:
Hi Simsonn I can’t seem to track this item as everything is in Chinese. All I can see is label created. Could you see where these items are please. Regards Steve Sent from my iPhone On 13 Dec 2025, at 09:08, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 







 
 Your order is on the way 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN4767
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your order is on the way 
 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Other tracking number: JSELB1377587652YQ
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) 
 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: 你好，史蒂夫·因斯       ​仓库可能尚未发货。我们正在查询，一旦发现问题，会尽快为您寄出。由此给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。
Hi Do you have an update on my items? Regards Steve Sent from my iPhone
Can I have an update? Or should I contact my bank to cancel payment? I was hoping these would be here before Christmas. Regards Steve Sent from my iPhone
Hi Steve Ince,    We apologize for the delay and will immediately urge the warehouse to ship your order as soon as possible.  Merry Christmas!  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELB1377587652YQ

Hi It seems that nothing is happening with these items. The tracking still just shows label created. If I do not see any change in this in the next day or so, I will contact my bank to cancel payment. Regards Steve Sent from my iPhone

Hi Steve Ince,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELB1377587652YQ
